---
description: YAML configuration for GeoTiff generation
icon: bird
---

# Code configuration

{% code fullWidth="true" %}
```
gen_from_geotiffs (bool): Generates context assigned output

data: 
  clust_reader_type: Reader type
  reader_kwargs:
    no_arg: "no_arg"
  subset_inds: List of lists. Number of sublists must correspond to number of geotiffs.
  create_separate (bool): 

gtiff_data: List with geotiffs.
cluster_fnames: List of zarr files

context:
  apply_context (bool): Applies context
  clusters: List of lists. Copied from .txt file in GeoTiff generation step
  name: List of label names
  compare_truth (bool): 
  generate_union (bool): 
```
{% endcode %}

**E.g. configuration:**

```yaml
gen_from_geotiffs: False

data:
  clust_reader_type: "zarr_to_numpy"
  reader_kwargs:
    no_arg: "no_arg"
  subset_inds: [ [ ], [ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ],[ ] ]
  create_separate: False
  
  gtiff_data: [
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/AVIRIS_C/aviris_20190821_p00r23.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr.full_geo.tif",
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/AVIRIS_C/aviris_20190821_p00r24.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr.full_geo.tif",
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/AVIRIS_C/aviris_20190821_p00r25.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr.full_geo.tif",
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/AVIRIS_C/aviris_20190821_p00r26.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr.full_geo.tif",
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/AVIRIS_C/aviris_20190821_p00r27.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr.full_geo.tif"
  ]
  
  cluster_fnames: [
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/zarrs/AVIRIS_zarrs/aviris_20190821_p00r23.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr",
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/zarrs/AVIRIS_zarrs/aviris_20190821_p00r24.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr",
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/zarrs/AVIRIS_zarrs/aviris_20190821_p00r25.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr",
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/zarrs/AVIRIS_zarrs/aviris_20190821_p00r26.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr",
    "/data/nlahaye/SIT_FUSE_Geo/zarrs/AVIRIS_zarrs/aviris_20190821_p00r27.tif.clust.data_79099clusters.zarr"
  ]

  apply_context: True
```
